biography.placeOfBirth: Jogjakarta, Jogjakarta, Dutch East Indies [now Yogyakarta, Indonesia]
biography.bio: Hendra Cipta was born on October 2, 1947 in Jogjakarta, Jogjakarta, Dutch East Indies. He is an actor, known for Hukum karma (1982), Tujuh wanita dalam tugas rahasia (1983) and Maidens Revenge (1987).
biography.name: Hendra Cipta

biography.bio: A famous Indonesian artist in 1980s and 1990s. Now she is a member of Indonesian parliament. She had law education and become an assistant lawyer and part time model. She resigned from her job at law firm and become a full time movie star. Later she became the producer of several popular TV Series. She married a famous Indonesian rock star, Mr Ikang Fawzi. She had twin daughters: Isabella Muliawati Fawzi (28 January 1988) and Marsha Chikita Fawzi (28 January 1989). In 2002, she was elected as member of parliament from West Java province. Now she is a candidate of the deputy governor of the new province of Banten. She was the eldest children in her family. Two of her sisters, Soraya Haque and Shanaz Haques are also famous actress and model.
biography.name: Marisa Haque

biography.bio: Ucok Harahap is an actor, known for Hukum karma (1982), Pursued by Sin (1974) and Loceng maut (1976).
biography.name: Ucok Harahap

biography.bio: Edy S. Jonathan is known for his work on Special Silencers (1979), American Hunter (1989) and Jaka tuak (1990).
biography.name: Edy S. Jonathan

biography.bio: Irwan K. is an actor, known for Hukum karma (1982).
biography.name: Irwan K.

biography.bio: Gudi Sintara is an actor, known for Escape from Hellhole (1983), Koral le justicier (1984) and Dongkrak antik (1982).
biography.name: Gudi Sintara

biography.placeOfBirth: Magelang, Kedoe, Dutch East Indies [now Magelang, Central Java, Indonesia]
biography.bio: Wolly Sutinah was born on July 17, 1915 in Magelang, Kedoe, Dutch East Indies. She was an actress, known for Bayi ajaib (1982), Pedjuang (1961) and Manusia enam juta dollar (1981). She died on September 14, 1987 in Jakarta, Indonesia.
biography.name: Wolly Sutinah

biography.placeOfBirth: Bandoeng, Preanger, Dutch East Indies [now Bandung, West Java, Indonesia]
biography.bio: Mieke Wijaya was born on March 17, 1940 in Bandoeng, Preanger, Dutch East Indies. She is an actress, known for Kembang semusim (1980), Gadis diseberang djalan (1960) and Dosa siapa (1972). She was previously married to Dicky Zulkarnaen.
biography.name: Mieke Wijaya
